comment.content: A thorough comparison of related XForms-based end-to-end solutions needs to be done.
comment.author: Markku Laine

comment.content: The XFormsDB framework should be properly evaluated with real users and case studies at some point.
comment.author: Emilia Mendes

post.headline: Living in Auckland, New Zealand
post.content: Thoughts about life while living in Auckland, New Zealand.
post.author: Markku Laine

comment.content: New Zealand has left-hand traffic (LHT), so it might take a while for me to adjust to it--especially when driving a car.
comment.author: Markku Laine

comment.content: Pedestrian lights work a bit differently here in New Zealand than in Finland. The green light is visible only for a second or two, after which it switches to blinking red for the next 10 seconds or so.
comment.author: Markku Laine

comment.content: Not all houses/apartments are insulated or have heating in New Zealand, which makes the apartments cold and damp.
comment.author: Markku Laine

comment.content: There are a wide variety of student restaurants available across campus.
comment.author: Markku Laine

post.headline: Travelling Round the World
post.content: Markku and Jenni travelling round the world in one and half months.
post.author: Markku Laine
